name: wgdashboard
tagline: A control panel for administering WireGuard servers
description: WGDashboard is a self-hosted control panel for WireGuard. It manages configurations, peers, and keys, and shows connection status in a web dashboard, simplifying the administration of WireGuard servers for homelabs and small networks.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Create and edit WireGuard configurations through a user-friendly web dashboard

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Generate QR codes for mobile client setup with automatic configuration encoding

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find specific peers quickly using search and filtering across large peer lists

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Export and import configurations for backup or migration to other servers

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Secure the dashboard with password authentication and optional two-factor authentication
